mapper.insert: insert into qna(qno, qna_title, qna_area, qna_writer, qna_quiryType, qna_content, qna_date) values(qno.nextval, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaArea}, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaQuiryType}, #{qnaContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select ceil(rownum / 5) as pageNo, qna.* from qna) where pageNo = #{pageNo} and qna_writer = #{userEmail}
select count(*) from qna where qna_writer = #{userEmail}
